channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: ‘SNL’: Watch Role Model Bring Out Charli XCX for ‘Sally, When the Wine Runs Out’
item.description: 🎉 Role Model + Charli XCX team up on 'SNL' for a perfomance of 'Sally, When the Wine Runs Out'! Let's dance! 🌟🎶 #MusicNews #SNL

item.title: Amy Poehler, Tina Fey, and Seth Meyers Return to Weekend Update for “Joke Off”
item.description: 🎤 SNL legends reunite for epic "Joke Off" on Weekend Update! 🙌 Who will bring the laughs? 🤣 #SNL #WeekendUpdate #ComedyIcons

item.title: David Byrne Welcomes Hayley Williams In New York
item.description: 🎶 David Byrne & Hayley Williams unite for a musical spectacle in the Big Apple! 🌟 #MusicalMagic #NYCvibes 🍎

item.title: Diane Keaton, Oscar-Winning Star of ‘Annie Hall’ and ‘The Godfather,’ Dies at 79
item.description: 🎶 Remembering the amazing talent of Diane Keaton 🌟 Rest in peace to a true Hollywood legend 🕊️ #DianeKeaton #HollywoodIcon

item.title: Stream Irish Exit’s Awesome Debut Album Tantrums In Tandem
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the vibrant sounds of Irish Exit's debut album Tantrums In Tandem! 🎸 Let the music take you on a wild ride! 🚀 #NewMusicFriday
